entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
